entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Elliot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:24 a.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
